name: obsidian-contractions-timer
description: Mobile-friendly contraction timer for Obsidian with wave charts, intensity tracking, and markdown-native data storage.

scripts.build: bun x tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && bun run esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: bun run version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: cybersader
